transArray.content:
very nice. The service attitude is good and the hotel is cleaned in a timely manner.
The accommodation environment is safe and reasonable, the sanitary conditions are good, and the front desk service is timely and smart. The surrounding environment is excellent and close to the university.
Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to leave a review. I hope you will have a pleasant stay and be in a good mood~ We will also work hard to do better~
